DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine AMG 827 effective compare placebo measure change Asthma Control Questionnaire ( ACQ ) composite score .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Dosing AMG 827 Subjects With Inadequately Controlled Asthma
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 65 year age Percent predict FEV1 ≥ 50 % ≤ 80 % At least 12 % reversibility prebronchodilator FEV1 Inhaled corticosteroid ( ICS ) ≥ 200 ≤ 1000 µg/day fluticasone equivalent . Ongoing asthma symptom ACQ composite score ≥ 1.5 point Respiratory infection within 4 week screen visit 1 week baseline visit History chronic obstructive pulmonary disease chronic pulmonary condition asthma Any uncontrolled clinically significant systemic disease ( eg , uncontrolled diabetes , liver disease )
